turns.content:
Sure, I can help you with that. Here are some visually appealing art styles for futuristic shamans with clear detail:

1. Aerial: Imagine a futuristic shamanic city floating high in the clouds, with towering spires and winding walkways. The architecture is a mix of ancient ruins and sleek, modern technology. The color palette is a mix of blues and greys, with accents of glowing purple and green. The mood is one of mystery and wonder, as if the viewer is exploring an otherworldly realm.

Command:
```c
/prefer option set option:futuristic-shaman-aerial value: - floating city in the clouds::5 mix of ancient ruins and modern technology, towering spires and winding walkways, blue and grey palette with accents of glowing purple and green::4 futuristic shamanic architecture, mysterious atmosphere, intricate details, creative design::3 deep, saturated colors, dramatic lighting, magical and otherworldly mood::3 no visible machinery or technology, focus on natural elements and the organic growth of the city::-2
```
2. Kingdom: Imagine a futuristic shamanic castle built into a towering mountain, with sprawling gardens and a network of hidden tunnels. The architecture is a blend of medieval and futuristic styles, with elements of both crystal and steel. The color palette is dominated by earthy tones, with splashes of vibrant red and gold. The mood is regal and mystical, as if the viewer has stumbled upon a long-lost kingdom.

Command:
```vbnet
/prefer option set option:futuristic-shaman-kingdom value: - shamanic castle built into a towering mountain::5 blend of medieval and futuristic styles, crystal and steel elements, sprawling gardens and hidden tunnels, earthy tones with splashes of red and gold::4 grand and regal architecture, mystical atmosphere, intricate details, strong creative choices::3 warm, inviting lighting, dramatic shadows, sense of history and tradition::3 no dark, dystopian or futuristic elements, focus on natural beauty and organic shapes::-2
```
3. Natural: Imagine a futuristic shamanic village built into the roots of a giant tree, with winding pathways and communal spaces. The architecture is a mix of natural materials and high-tech design, with a focus on sustainability and harmony with the environment. The color palette is a mix of greens and browns, with accents of warm oranges and yellows. The mood is peaceful and serene, as if the viewer has entered a sacred space.

Command:
```sql
/prefer option set option:futuristic-shaman-natural value: - shamanic village built into the roots of a giant tree::5 mix of natural materials and high-tech design, winding pathways and communal spaces, green and brown palette with accents of warm orange and yellow::4 sustainable and harmonious architecture, peaceful atmosphere, intricate details, sense of unity with nature::3 soft, natural lighting, sense of calm and tranquility, focus on the beauty of the natural world::3 no harsh, artificial lighting or colors, no focus on technology or machinery::-2
```
And here are the /imagine commands for generating artworks with the three styles:

1. Aerial:
```less
/imagine prompt:Exploring a Floating City with Mystical Ruins, Luminescent Walkways, and a Mysterious Fog, bathed in Moonlight, --futuristic-shaman-aerial --ar 16:9
```
2. Kingdom:
```sql
/imagine prompt:Discovering a Hidden Castle in the Mountains, with Crystal Caverns, Secret Gardens, and a Majestic View, illuminated by Sunlight and Magical Energy, --futuristic-shaman-kingdom --ar 16:9
```
3. Natural:
```bash
/imagine prompt
```

Hey Assistant, I need your help creating Midjourney command for AI Art Suffixes. 
 
The command for this kind of suffix should be in this format.
 
`/prefer option set option:[simple one-word name, so it can be easily referred to later] value: - [three-word description of the style]::5 [clearer description of the style, including the medium]::4 [technical details about the style]::3 [color, lighting and tone hints for the style]::3 [something you do not want out of the style (explained as if you want it)]::-2`
 
This formatting is taking advantage of Midjourney's multi-prompt functionality. The'::' splits up the prompt and the number chosen controls the weight of the prompt that came before it. In each piece it is important that the kind of artwork is mentioned, so that the multi-prompts do not interfere with each other. Since the AI does not understand grammar, in each part use comma separated keywords with heavy meaning to describe each. 
 
For example:
`/prefer option set option:impressionist value: - beautiful impressionist painting::5 dramatic oil painting, sweeping, expressive swirling strokes::4 painting, swirling impasto, thick brushes, pallet knife, strong creative choices, obvious brush marks::3 painted with saturated, epic colors, highly visual, rule of thirds::3 dull, boring, and ugly artwork::-2`
 
`/prefer option set option:portrait value: - headshot portrait photography::5 beautiful rich photograph, with focal depth and a majestic blurring behind the subject's face::4 portrait photograph taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark IV DSLR, f/5.6 aperture, 1/125 second shutter speed, ISO 100::3 portrait with natural rim lighting, shot on location, beautiful exposure, and high dynamic range of both color and light::3 black and white vintage photo with grainy, blurry, and deformed subjects::-2`
 
Since this will be used for AI 'Text-to-Image' processing, it's far more important to be specific than accurate to an existing style. Make bold and interesting choices when you invent your own art style.
 
Please start by describing a visually appealing art style with clear detail so someone would be inspired to try the command. (Write in the format of persuasive ad copy) Then provide the command itself (as a code block so it can be easily copy and pasted). Repeat this task for three tries based on the following specification:
 
I would like three options for creating images of futuristic shamans. Please create aerial, kingdom, and natural. 
 
#----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
 
Now could you help me create Midjourney commands for generating artworks with those styles (--aerial, --kingdom, and --natural)
Format:
`/imagine prompt:[Scene] with [Traits], [Lighting], [Mood]. --[Parameter] --ar [w:h]'
 
Scene, traits, lighting, and mood can be brief descriptions in plain English. Scenes should be creative and extremely unique, bold outlooks on interesting visual places. Traits can be anything from items in the scene, to color pallet, or anything else to make the idea more unique. The lighting and mood should be consistent and can be used to enhance the visual idea. 
 
Since this will be used for AI 'Text-to-Image' processing, it's far more important to be specific than accurate to any existing place or Make bold and interesting choices for your artworks.
 
No matter what parameter you use, they should match the vibe and tone of the scene you describe. 
 
I will use these as wallpapers so please make the aspect ratio 16:9. 
 
Please create 5 /imagine commands in the previously described format. Please make sure the parameter used is right for the image you are generating. Please put each command into code blocks so they can be easily copied.

Sure, I'd be happy to help you with that! Here are the art styles and Midjourney commands you requested:

### Futuristic Shaman Art Styles

#### Option 1: Aerial

Imagine a futuristic shaman standing on a floating platform in the middle of a swirling vortex of neon lights. The platform is made of a crystalline substance, and the shaman is surrounded by hovering orbs that emit a soft, pulsing glow.
```sql
/imagine prompt:Aerial scene with swirling vortex, floating platform, hovering orbs, neon lights, and crystal substance. Soft, pulsing glow. --aerial --ar 16:9
```
#### Option 2: Kingdom

Imagine a futuristic shaman standing at the center of a kingdom, surrounded by towering buildings and structures that look like they are made of iridescent glass. The shaman wears a cape made of shimmering energy, and their eyes glow with an otherworldly light.
```sql
/imagine prompt:Kingdom scene with iridescent glass buildings, shimmering energy cape, and glowing eyes. Ethereal and otherworldly. --kingdom --ar 16:9
```
#### Option 3: Natural

Imagine a futuristic shaman standing in a lush, vibrant jungle, surrounded by exotic flora and fauna. The shaman wears a suit made of bioluminescent material, and their staff is adorned with glowing crystals. The sky is filled with brilliant stars and a glowing aurora borealis.
```sql
/imagine prompt:Natural scene with lush jungle, exotic flora and fauna, bioluminescent suit, glowing crystals, stars, and aurora borealis. Mystical and awe-inspiring. --natural --ar 16:9
```
### Midjourney Commands

#### Command 1

Imagine a futuristic city built into a massive tree trunk, with winding pathways and platforms leading to different levels. The tree is bioluminescent and glows with a soft, green light. The shaman stands at the base of the tree, holding a staff adorned with glowing crystals. The sky is filled with stars and a glowing aurora borealis.
```sql
/imagine prompt:Tree city scene with bioluminescent tree, winding pathways and platforms, staff adorned with glowing crystals, stars, and aurora borealis. Mysterious and mystical. --natural --ar 16:9
```
#### Command 2

Imagine a futuristic shaman standing on a rocky outcropping overlooking a glowing, futuristic city. The shaman wears a flowing robe made of shimmering energy and holds a staff that crackles with electricity. The sky is filled with bolts of lightning and a massive, glowing moon.
```sql
/imagine prompt:Overlooking scene with glowing futuristic city, flowing energy robe, staff crackling with electricity, bolts of lightning, and massive glowing moon. Powerful and awe-inspiring. --aerial --ar 16:9
```
#### Command 3

Imagine a futuristic shaman standing at the entrance to a massive temple, with stone pillars reaching up to the sky. The shaman wears a helmet made of glowing crystals and holds a staff that emits a pulsing energy. The sky is filled with swirling clouds and lightning.
```sql
/imagine prompt:Temple scene with stone pillars, helmet made of glowing crystals, staff emitting pulsing energy, swirling clouds, and lightning. Mystical and powerful. --kingdom --ar 16:9
```
#### Command 4
